20101215020749.333|20101215020751.000|CCO|CHARGE OF GETTING THE REALITY

20101215020759.000|20101215020801.000|CCO|THE WALL.

20101215020803.500|20101215020806.000|CCO|MEMORY LANE AND WE WENT TO OUR 
20101215020806.000|20101215020808.500|CCO|OLD HOUSE AND BY THE TIME WE
